snippet.title: CrumbleMiner Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
📌 WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2813560?beta=1

CrumbleMiner is a Frenetic Rogue-like Pixelart Platformer without jumping! Align your explosive barrel and BLAST trough rocks collecting precious gems and ride on top of a ROCKET barrel while avoiding your death through the dangerous Crumble Mines!

Hello everybody! I finally opened up the Steam page for the first game I'll ever release, CrumbleMiner! It's a little indie game I started developing on January 1st for a challenge in which me and other members of my discord server tried to complete a polished prototype of an indie game in a single month, as an exercise to become better and faster developers and to learn how to avoid scope creep, which is something that plagues us indie game developers :P
The OST was created by my incredibly multi talented brother PianoSoul! :D
https://www.youtube.com/@PianoSoulAnimeCovers

CrumbleMiner is inspired by the barrel sections seen in the Donkey Kong Country series by nintendo, aswell as a slight inspiration from minecraft and the graphics are very inspired by Downwell!
